content.description: The route starts below two parallel cracks near the base of the south buttress.  Face climbing past 2 bolts leads to the right-hand crack.  Crack climbing leads to a ledge.  A short pitch up a left-facing dihedral leads to another ledge.  The crux pitch climbs vertical knobs past 2 bolts.  Belay on a spacious ledge with a massive block.  Scramble back away from the edge and up until reaching the steep summit headwall.  Climb a clean crack to the summit.
content.protection:
Very small to 1-1/2"

Do not expect to find modern fixed gear.
content.location: Cosmo climbs the buttress of rock that faces the road.  This is the first piece of rock encountered along the hikers trail.  A short bushwack from the trail leads to the base.
